title: Why Verstappen was master of Imola's final F1 monster mash
summary: A brilliant performance in a pacy Red Bull — plus some lucky timing — pulled Max Verstappen clear of the pack in the 2025 Emilia-Romagna Grand Prix, which looks set to mark F1's final race at Imola

qa_pairs.question: Who won the 2025 Emilia-Romagna Grand Prix?
Which team did Max Verstappen drive for during the 2025 Emilia-Romagna Grand Prix?
What significance does the 2025 Emilia-Romagna Grand Prix hold in Formula 1 history?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: It is set to be F1's final race at Imola.
wrong_options: It was the first race of the season.
It marked the introduction of new regulations.
It was a night race for the first time.
